title: nf-atacseq samplesheet schema
description: Schema for the samplesheet input to nf-atacseq pipeline

sample.description: Sample identifier. Must be unique and contain no whitespace.
sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.description: Path to FASTQ file for read 1. File must have extension '.fq', '.fq.gz', '.fastq', or '.fastq.gz'.
fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.fq', '.fq.gz', '.fastq', or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.description: Path to FASTQ file for read 2 (optional for single-end data). File must have extension '.fq', '.fq.gz', '.fastq', or '.fastq.gz'.
fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fq.gz', '.fastq', or '.fastq.gz'

sample_name.description: Sample name matching genotype in VCF (optional). If not provided, uses 'sample' column value.
